title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to plunge Gotham into anarchy.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: Various interconnected stories of criminals in Los Angeles unfold in a non-linear narrative.

title: Forrest Gump
description: A simple man with a low IQ witnesses and influences several defining historical events.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a final job.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion against machines.

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his rise and fall.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Lion King
description: Lion prince Simba flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family and infiltrate their household.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General seeks vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police try to identify each other while infiltrating gangs.

title: Whiplash
description: A promising drummer enrolls at a music conservatory where he meets a ruthless instructor.

title: The Prestige
description: Two magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship with tragic results.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop an alien invasion threatening Earth.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man and meets other Spider-People from alternate dimensions.

title: Joker
description: A failed comedian descends into madness and becomes the criminal known as Joker.

title: Coco
description: A young boy enters the Land of the Dead to unlock his family's history.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A concierge and his protégé become embroiled in theft and a murder investigation.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of Facebook's founding and the lawsuits that followed.

title: Frozen
description: A fearless princess sets off on a journey to find her estranged sister.

title: Zootopia
description: A rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to solve a mystery.

title: Finding Nemo
description: A clownfish travels across the ocean to find his abducted son.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened when a new spaceman action figure supplants him.

title: Up
description: An elderly man uses balloons to fly his house to South America.

title: WALL-E
description: A robot designed to clean a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love.

title: Ratatouille
description: A rat who dreams of becoming a chef teams up with a young kitchen worker.

title: Inside Out
description: Young Riley's emotions try to guide her through a difficult life transition.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa returns home to Wakanda to take his place as king.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
description: Thor must race against time to stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his world.

title: Doctor Strange
description: A neurosurgeon discovers the hidden world of magic and alternate dimensions.

title: Ant-Man
description: A master thief becomes the size-changing superhero Ant-Man.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance.

title: Iron Man
description: After being held captive, a billionaire builds a suit of armor to fight evil.

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
description: Steve Rogers teams up with Black Widow to battle a new threat from history.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet seeks help from an imprisoned cannibal killer to catch another killer.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: The Usual Suspects
description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a soap salesman.

title: American Beauty
description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis.

title: The Truman Show
description: An insurance salesman discovers his entire life is actually a reality TV show.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories.

title: Her
description: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: A young blade runner's discovery leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms.

title: Ex Machina
description: A programmer is invited to administer a Turing test to an intelligent humanoid robot.

title: The Martian
description: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars and must survive using his ingenuity.
